# R client for the Global Lakes and Wetlands Database (GLWD)

## Installation

```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("jsta/glwdr")
```

### Load Package
```{r }
library(glwdr)
```

## Usage

### Level 1
```{r eval=FALSE} 
glwd_get(level = 1)

dt <- glwd_load(level = 1)
```

```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,results='hide'} 
library(glwdr)

dt <- suppressMessages(glwd_load(level = 1))
```

```{r }
library(maps)
library(sp)

dt <- dt[dt$COUNTRY == "United States" & dt$LAT_DEG < 56,] 
 
map("state")

plot(dt, add = TRUE, col = "blue")
```

```{r }
dt@data[1:5,]
```

## References
